title: Can't buy Skins from Snowday shop
body:
There is challenger arhi skin in my snowday shop.
But it seems i cant buy it. 
Can anyone tell whats the problem?
When i click on to purchase the skin. It says "We encountered an error handling your request. Give it another shot"
Although I tried many times it still says the same thing.

replies.body:
Hey IsuckNuts,

This error often occurs when you attempt to purchase a skin that is discounted in the PVP.net Store. Were you able to purchase Challenger Ahri yet?
I did buy her afterward because  in snowdown shop it said 60% off but it was 50% off anyways in the store.
